definitions.example: Turn that music down; it's too loud.

definitions.definition: (of a person, thing, event, etc.) Noisy.
definitions.example: a loud party that went on all night

definitions.definition: (of a person, event, etc.) Not subtle or reserved, brash.
(of clothing, decorations, etc.) Having unpleasantly and tastelessly contrasting colours or patterns; gaudy.
definitions.example: a loud style of dress;  loud colors

definitions.definition: (of marijuana) High-quality; premium; (by extension) having a strong or pungent odour indicating good quality
